welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Clemente, where beautiful beaches, charming shops, and a laid-back atmosphere await you. We hope you enjoy your time exploring our city and all it has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as United and Alaska Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
